009package Delaunay_Triangulation;
010
011import java.awt.BasicStroke;
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.gui.Overlay;
019import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
022import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.DelaunayTriangulation;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.Triangle;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
028
029
030/**
031 * This plugin runs the Harris corner detector on the current image, 
032 * applies Delaunay triangulation to the N strongest corners and displays
033 * the result as a vector overlay in a new image.
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/06/25
037 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
038 * @see DelaunayTriangulation
039 */
040public class Delaunay_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        private static int CornerCount = 0;                                     // number of corners to show (0 = show all)
043        private static boolean ShuffleCorners = true;   
044        
045        private static Color DelaunayColor = Color.green;       // color for graph edges
046        private static Color PointColor = Color.red;            // color for point markers
047        
048        private static double StrokeWidth = 0.25;
049        private static double PointRadius = 1.0;
050        
051        private static HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters params = new HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters();
052        
053
054        private ImagePlus im = null;
055        
056    @Override
057        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
058        this.im = im;
059        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
060    }
061    
062    @Override
063        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064        
065                if (!showDialog()) {
066                        return;
067                }
068                
069                HarrisCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
070                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
071
072                DelaunayTriangulation dt = DelaunayTriangulation.from(corners, ShuffleCorners);
073                
074                ImageProcessor cp = ip.convertToByteProcessor();
075                Overlay oly = makeOverlay(dt);
076
077                ImagePlus im2 = new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-delaunay", cp);
078                im2.setOverlay(oly);
079                im2.show();
080    }
081    
082        private boolean showDialog() {
083                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
084                dlg.addNumericField("Corner score threshold", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
085                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
086                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", CornerCount, 0);
087                dlg.addCheckbox("Shuffle corners", ShuffleCorners);
088                
089                dlg.showDialog();
090                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
091                        return false;   
092                
093                params.scoreThreshold = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
094                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
095                CornerCount = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
096                ShuffleCorners = dlg.getNextBoolean();
097                
098                if(dlg.invalidNumber() || !params.validate()) {
099                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
100                        return false;
101                }       
102                return true;
103        }
104        
105        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
106        
107        private Overlay makeOverlay(DelaunayTriangulation dt) {
108                List<Triangle> triangles = dt.getTriangles();
109                List<Pnt2d> allPoints = dt.getPoints();
110                
111                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
112                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
113
114                // draw the triangles:
115                ColoredStroke triangleStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, DelaunayColor);
116                triangleStroke.setEndCap(BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND);
117                triangleStroke.setLineJoin(BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND);
118                
119                ola.setStroke(triangleStroke);
120                for (Triangle trgl : triangles) {
121                         ola.addShape(trgl.getShape());
122                }
123                
124                // draw the vertices of the triangulation:
125                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor);
126                ola.setStroke(pointStroke);
127                for (Pnt2d p : allPoints) {
128                        // get original Pnt2d shape (not Corner shape)
129                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(p).getShape(PointRadius));
130                }
131
132                return oly;
133        }
134        
135}
